pullrequest.title: Hack for macOS mojave to link to -lconsole_bridge

content.raw: I made a mistake while testing this branch (dart was uninstalled), so I thought the first commit was working, when it actually wasn't. In e31be8d, I've moved the `link_directories` calls to before the targets are created, so it should work now.
content.html: I made a mistake while testing this branch (dart was uninstalled), so I thought the first commit was working, when it actually wasn't. In e31be8d, I've moved the link_directories calls to before the targets are created, so it should work now.
